plot outline: Vikram and Vedha fall for each other but Vedha's friend Sumathi remains secretly in love with Vikram. Then one day Vedha and Sumathi take a video of a crime taking place at an old age home, getting themselves in trouble. Vedha tries to get out of it but Sumathi, out of jealousy, plots against her instead.
title: Ranabhoomi
plot: Vikram falls in love with Vedha but her best friend Sumathi who is also in love with Vikram unexpectedly gets her into trouble and instead of helping her plots against her.

Vikram and Vedha fall for each other but Vedha's friend Sumathi remains secretly in love with Vikram. Then one day Vedha and Sumathi take a video of a crime taking place at an old age home, getting themselves in trouble. Vedha tries to get out of it but Sumathi, out of jealousy, plots against her instead.
